clues.name: GreenYes
clues.content: That is correct.  What are you implying, detective?

clues.name: GreenNo
clues.content: Have you any proof, detective? | I do not believe that I own [Weapon], but you seem quite sure.

clues.name: YellowYes
clues.content: Oh, I'm sorry, I thought you already knew that I had [Weapon].

clues.name: YellowNo
clues.content: Oh, I lost [Weapon] weeks ago, honey.

clues.name: RedYes
clues.content: Yes, I have [Weapon].  Is that really your major breakthrough here?

clues.name: BlackYes
clues.content: If you must know, child, I do own [Weapon].

clues.name: BlackNo
clues.content: That is nothing more than false, child.  I'll hear no more of it.

clues.name: BlueYes
clues.content: I try not to use it, but I do have [Weapon].

clues.name: BlueNo
clues.content: I wouldn't touch the thing.  Unless you wanted me to, of course.
